title: Accidentally dismissed Google One Trial on Pixel 4a
content:
Hello
I accidentally dismissed immediately after activation the 3 months trial of Google one with additional sale for next 6 months after the trial period (something like 50 % off for the first 6 months).

I couldn't find the option to directly contact support via chat/mail because I am currently using the device in other country where is The Pixel not officially sold.

Is there some way to redeem the offer for the first activation (3 months free trial + sale 50 % off for next 6 months)?

Thank you very much for response.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
